name: Trickster Lite - Multiplayer
description:
Who of your friends knows you best? Who finds out which answer is tricked and which is true? How can you characterize yourself as creative as possible? Who is the Trickster?

Attention: This is the Trickster LITE version with only 10 playable cards.

Get the full version with all 250 cards and regular map updates. Only one*r of you need the TRICKSTER full version, which includes all cards. When it*r creates the game, everyone - including the LITE players* - can enjoy the unlimited fun of the game.


The Trickster game principle:

- You must be at least three to play Trickster.

- All players* see an incomplete statement on their smartphone, for example "If I won the lottery tomorrow, I would be the first...".

- The players* inside must complete the statement now in such a way that they put themselves best possible into the Trickster and answer as if he had written this answer himself. The Trickster answers the question to the best of his knowledge and belief.

- Once everyone has typed in their answer, the display shows all the suggested solutions, including that of the Trickster, which has to be guessed.

- Now every*r* player* types in which of the statements he/she thinks the Trickster has written. Then the game is resolved.

- Points are awarded to any player who has correctly guessed the Trickster's statement. Points are also awarded if the player's own suggestion has been made. The trickster receives points for every correctly guessed tip.
